lesson.title: HTML Lists
lesson.description: Overview of different types of lists in HTML and their usage.

topics.description: Used for listing items without any specific order.
Used for listing items in a specific order.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Changes the type of numbering (e.g., A, a, I, i, 1).

attributes.name: reversed
attributes.description: Reverses the order of the list.

attributes.name: start
attributes.description: Specifies the start value of the list.

topics.description: Ordered lists that contain other HTML elements such as links and paragraphs.
